EnterpriseSupportFormRow.title: Welcome to the Serverless world
EnterpriseSupportFormRow.description: Adopting serverless app development frees you from costly server management and gives you a fast development cycle.
EnterpriseSupportFormRow.meritDescription1: You don't need to worry about new technology. The Skeet team will help you with a wide range of things, such as Firestore database design, TypeScript, serverless architecture security considerations, etc.
EnterpriseSupportFormRow.meritTitle2: Develop apps with the Skeet team
EnterpriseSupportFormRow.meritDescription2: You can proceed with app development with the team that developed Skeet. As a creator of Skeet and a Google Cloud partner, learn best practices for serverless development from our experienced team.
EnterpriseSupportFormRow.meritDescription3: The Skeet team will fully support your migration. Training and code audits are also available upon request. Reduce costs, improve scalability, and increase development agility by going serverless.
